Style Definitions */  table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name:"Table Normal"; mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0; mso-tstyle-colband-size:0; mso-style-noshow:yes; mso-style-priority:99; mso-style-qformat:yes; mso-style-parent:""; mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-para-margin-top:0in; mso-para-margin-right:0in; mso-para-margin-bottom:10.0pt; mso-para-margin-left:0in; line-height:115%; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:11.0pt; font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif"; mso-ascii-font-family:Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin; mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"; mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family:Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"; mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-bidi;}  <![endif]-->  <p class="MsoNormal">  	  Hey there! Do you want to learn the <strong style="">easiest way</strong> to build powerful and world class websites? Do you want to <strong style="">make money as a CMS web designer</strong>? Do you want to master more CMS web design platforms for <strong style="">one price</strong>? Then this is the course for you!  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  	  Content Management System (CMS) is a software that allows you to design beautiful websites <strong style="">WITHOUT CODING</strong> as the design process is done in the browser (so don’t worry if you don’t like code, I don’t like it too).<strong style=""> Programming knowledge IS NOT A PRE-REQUISITE for this course!</strong>  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  	  CMS websites are also<strong style=""> easy to manage,</strong> you simply teach your clients how to<strong style=""> login, make a few clicks</strong> and they can update/manage any area of the website! And the good part is…they don’t have to know even one word of coding! <strong style="">That will give them a reason to pay you more!</strong> so CMS is definitely the way to go!  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  	  This course is made up of 8 sections, covering <strong style="">7</strong> Content Management System (CMS) platforms namely; <strong style="">Joomla</strong>, <strong style="">WordPress</strong>, <strong style="">Concrete5</strong>, <strong style="">ImpressPages</strong> <strong style="">CMS</strong>, <strong style="">Clipper CMS, CMSimple</strong> and <strong style="">gpEasy CMS</strong>. All<strong style=""> from scratch, in one course and for one price</strong>! This is the one stop CMS course.  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  	  You will learn how to install Xampp as a local-host server for your projects, so you don’t need to pay extra money for hosting fees just to create CMS websites. You will also learn how to download the CMS packages and install them on your local-host (same process for live-host), setup the databases that they need and get them up and running!  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  	  All the lectures are delivered in a ‘made simple’ step by step practical demonstration, which makes it easy for you to grasp the concepts.  If you have never designed a website in your life or seeking more knowledge on CMS software then you are at the right place! You are going to <strong style="">LEARN BY DOING</strong> meaning<strong style=""> we will design a total of 7 websites</strong> in this course, one for each CMS platform and you will see how its done <strong style="">step by step!</strong>  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  	  So, what are we waiting for? Let’s get started!  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  </p>  <p class="MsoNormal">  </p>
title: Design websites that sell: learn 7 CMS software from scratch
